 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂיב‎</span> **verb** ==be hoary== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂיבָה‎</span> ***old age***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šêbu***</u></abbr>, ***aged man***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***become hoary***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (in derivatives); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סִיב‎</span> ***be old***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***grow old***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***grey hair***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָקַנְתִּי וָשַׂ֫בְתִּי‎</span> [[1Sam.12.2|1Sam 12:2]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂב‎</span> [[Job.15.10|Job 15:10]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשִׁישׁ‎</span> ***aged***).
